definition: in general/more or less/in rough terms/basically/on the whole/overall situation/the big picture/(Tw) remains (of a dead person)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to fail to see the larger issue (idiom)/to fail to grasp the big picture

sentences.english: By using big VOXEL, the color or texture of a volume is rendered.
sentences.chinese: 通過大體素可顯示體的顏色與材質等屬性。

sentences.english: In general, this is even better news for developers.
sentences.chinese: 大體上，這對於開發者來說是件好事。

sentences.english: Orgasm is also likely to be similar in transgender and intersex individuals.
sentences.chinese: 而對於變性人和雌雄間性人來說也大體類似。

sentences.english: Results Macroscopically, the tumor appeared as a hard grayish-white mass.
sentences.chinese: 結果大體檢查腫瘤呈質硬灰白色腫塊。

sentences.english: The first regional demarcations followed roughly the settlement patterns of various ethnic immigrant groups.
sentences.chinese: 最初的區域界限大體沿循各族裔移民羣體的定居模式。

sentences.english: All in all, the party was pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 大體說來，這次舞會是另人愉快的。

sentences.english: The image above shows the general outline of a fixed-width website layout.
sentences.chinese: 上圖顯示了固定寬度網頁佈局大體上的實現方式。

sentences.english: This is the gross appearance of a parathyroid carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 甲狀旁腺癌的大體外觀。

sentences.english: And the femur of course carries the body, to a large extent.
sentences.chinese: 股骨大體上，支撐着它的身體。

sentences.english: I envy you for giving such a personable and astute son gifted in both cultural and military affairs.
sentences.chinese: 朕羨慕你，有這樣識大體明事理，且文武兼備的兒子。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, the economic development in this area is not bad.
sentences.chinese: 大體說來，這個地區的經濟發展還算不錯。

sentences.english: That’s because your financial circumstances are pretty much the same as those of your classmates.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你和你同學的經濟情況大體相當。

sentences.english: On balance, dress designing appeals to me most.
sentences.chinese: 大體上說，我最喜歡服裝設計。

sentences.english: The intent of 820.130 is to add the broad conditions that are considered for a package design.
sentences.chinese: 部分規定的目的是增加包裝設計所需考慮的大體條件。

sentences.english: Large dark green lanes, there are gray stone miscellaneous flaws, resulting in the Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 大體呈墨綠，雜有灰白石瑕，產生於漢代。

sentences.english: Some Heathen moralists also have taught very much the same lesson.
sentences.chinese: 一些非基督教的道德家，也說過大體相同的教言。

definition: aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to contrast/to compare/to place side by side for comparison (as parallel texts)/to check
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
